attributes.action: Control Excessive Immigration - Preserve England's Green and Pleasant Land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To prevent and manage immigration into the UK preserving our green countryside and preventing the development of a polluted noisey England with lots of house building and loss of our beautiful green countryside. Help preserve our countryside, our beautiful trees, shrubs and wildlife. Help keep traffic on our roads down, preserving our roads and reducing the generation of excessive noise and disruption to traffic to carry out repair of same. Help preserve good air quality and prevent excessive noise and air pollution, which will result if excessive population is permitted to grow unchecked.  Let us reduce the need for excessive building, road repairs and an increase of cars on the roads. 
Help save our Green and Pleasant Land - Control Excessive Immigration.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
